name: MIS Alerts and Activities
description: List of all alerts (Active Y / N prompt) and Activities (active).

dataset.name: Alerts
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_ALERT.ALERT_DESCRIPTION, CASE WHEN AT_ALERT.ALERT_ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y' THEN AT_ALERT.ALERT_TYPE_DESCRIPTION END AS ALERT_CATEGORY_DESCRIPTION FROM BODIMIS.DIM_ALERT AT_ALERT WHERE (AT_ALERT.ALERT_ACTIVE_FLAG IN (SELECT UNKNOWN_PARAMETER FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Alert Active Flag (All for all)','A','Alerts\Alert Active Flag',multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:101) */) OR 'All' IN (SELECT UNKNOWN_PARAMETER FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Alert Active Flag (All for all)','A','Alerts\Alert Active Flag',multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:101) */))), dataset_ AS (SELECT ALERT_DESCRIPTION, ALERT_CATEGORY_DESCRIPTION FROM dataset_base_)

parameters.name: unknown_parameter
parameters.description: @Prompt('Alert Active Flag (All for all)','A','Alerts\Alert Active Flag',multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:101)

dataset.name: MIS Load Date
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.BUSINESS_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT BUSINESS_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Activities
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DISTINCT AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_SERVICE.CODE, AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_SERVICE.DESCRIPTION, AT_ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE.CODE AS ACTIVITY_CODE, AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE.DESCRIPTION AS ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_PROGRAMME_SERVICE AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_SERVICE, BODIMIS.DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE WHERE (AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE.PROGRAMME_TYPE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.PROGRAMME_TYPE_SK) AND (AT_ACTIVITY_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_SERVICE.PROGRAMME_SERVICE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_ACTIVITY.PROGRAMME_SERVICE_SK) AND ((AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE.SCHEDULE_END_DATE IS NULL OR AT_DIM_PROGRAMME_TYPE.SCHEDULE_END_DATE > TRUNC(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)))), dataset_ AS (SELECT CODE, DESCRIPTION, ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, ACTIVITY_CODE, ACTIVITY_DESCRIPTION FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Query 18
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING_CASE_NOTES.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_CASE_NOTE_TYPE.CODE FROM BODIMIS.DIM_REFERENCE_CODES AT_CASE_NOTE_TYPE, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING_CASE_NOTES, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP, BODIMIS.FACT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTE AT_FACT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTE, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */)) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (AT_CASE_NOTE_TYPE.REFERENCE_CODE_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTE.CASE_NOTE_TYPE_CODE_SK) AND (AT_CASE_NOTE_TYPE.CODE_DOMAIN = 'TASK_TYPE') AND (AT_FACT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTE.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING_CASE_NOTES.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK = AT_FACT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTE.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_CASE_NOTE_TYPE.CODE IN ('POM') AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK IN (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code (All for all)','A','Associated Establishment\Associated Establishment Code',multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:69) */) OR 'All' IN (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE FROM prompt_ /* = #Prompt('Establishment Code (All for all)','A','Associated Establishment\Associated Establishment Code',multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:69) */)))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, CODE FROM dataset_base_)

parameters.name: establishment_code
parameters.description: @Prompt('Establishment Code (All for all)','A','Associated Establishment\Associated Establishment Code',multi,free,Not_Persistent,User:69)

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE ALERT_CATEGORY_DESCRIPTION NOT(IN ('Not Applicable','Not Valid','Unknown')))

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE ALERT_CATEGORY_DESCRIPTION NOT(IN ('Not Applicable','Not Valid','Unknown')))

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE ALERT_CATEGORY_DESCRIPTION NOT(IN ('Not Applicable','Not Valid','Unknown')))
